label: Limit justified written customer service complaints to no more than three per calendar year; take corrective action if exceeded.
quote: The contractor will receive no more than three (3) justified written customer service complaints from customers or Program Office Management within one calendar year... If more than three (3) written complaints are received, the contractor will take corrective action. If the performance has not been satisfied within 90-days, the contractor employee will be removed from the contract.

label: Prepare and submit an electronic copy of the QCP Report to the COR by the 10th of each month for the previous month’s services.
quote: The contractor will prepare and submit an electronic copy of the QCP Report to the COR by the 10th of each month for the previous month’s services.

label: Submit a draft copy of the QCP no later than 5 calendar days after contract award date.
quote: The contractor will submit a draft copy of the QCP no later than 5 calendar days after contract award date.

label: Submit finalized QCP to the COR no later than 15 calendar days after contract award date.
quote: The contractor’s finalized QCP will be submitted to the COR no later than 15 calendar days after contract award date.

label: Perform all requirements in the SOW within one month of contract award.
quote: ...it is vitally important that the contractor be able to perform all requirements in this SOW within one month of contract award.

label: Submit a draft copy of a detailed Transition-In Plan at the time of the proposal, including methodology, timeline, and risk mitigation.
quote: The contractor will submit a draft copy of a detailed Transition-In Plan at the time of the proposal. The Transition-In Plan will include the following: A detailed transition methodology in logical sequence to ensure a smooth transition of all tasks of the contract without interruption or degradation of service levels; A timeline for completion; and Associated risk, issues, and risk mitigation strategies.

label: Submit the final Transition-In Plan to the COR no later than 5 calendar days after contract award date.
quote: The final Transition-In Plan will be submitted to the COR no later than 5 calendar days after contract award date.

label: At contract expiration, ensure all records, documents, and files are shipped by USPS Priority Mail with receipted delivery.
quote: At the expiration of this contract, the contractor will ensure that all records, documents, and files are shipped under the terms of the contract by the U. S. Postal Service Priority Mail with receipted delivery (i.e., returned receipt, ...
